page.title: 18Media
page.content:
Local Reports - June 1985
{HOWZAT - AN UMPIRE IS BOWLED OVER A local cricket umpire was reduced to size before a recent Bolsover Colliery team's cricket match. The pavillion floorboards gave way during a pre-match talk.
{ BOLSOVER HERALDS The Heralds Junior Jazz Band competed in a gala organised by the Mickleover Super Trouper Jazz Band. They were awarded eight 1sts, eight 2nds and seven 3rds.
{ BOFFINS' TRIP INTO THE PAST English Heritage looks after about 400 historic monuments and sites throughout England. On June 26th about 20 representatives of the organisation visited Bolsover Castle.
